education.label: Education
education.title: What is Answer Engine Optimization?
education.description: Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) is the practice of optimizing website content to be selected, cited, and surfaced by AI-powered answer engines. Unlike traditional SEO that targets search engine result pages, AEO focuses on making your content the preferred source that large language models like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google Gemini reference when generating answers.
education.descriptionBold: Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) is the practice of optimizing website content to be selected, cited, and surfaced by AI-powered answer engines.
education.descriptionRest: Unlike traditional SEO that targets search engine result pages, AEO focuses on making your content the preferred source that large language models like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google Gemini reference when generating answers.

phases.sectionSubtitle: 7 phases that take you from invisible to cited. Each phase builds on the last — here’s what to expect.
phases.footer: The 99-point checklist guides you through every task in every phase.
phases.footerSuffix: guides you through every task in every phase.

0.title: Foundation & Audit
0.description: Audit existing content and technical infrastructure. Map questions, analyze competitors, and establish your AEO baseline.
0.visibility: Know where you stand — baseline metrics and content gaps identified

1.title: Structured Data & Schema
1.description: Implement FAQ, HowTo, Article, Product, and Organization schema markup to make your content machine-readable.
1.visibility: AI engines can now read and understand your content structure

2.title: Content Optimization
2.description: Restructure content with answer paragraphs, heading hierarchy, comparison tables, and topic clusters.
2.visibility: Your content becomes the best possible answer for AI queries

3.title: Technical AEO
3.description: Configure AI bot access, semantic HTML, RSS feeds, internal linking, and meta optimization.
3.visibility: AI crawlers can access and extract your content efficiently

4.title: Authority & Trust
4.description: Build E-E-A-T signals, authority backlinks, Google Business Profile, and citation networks.
4.visibility: AI engines trust your content as a credible, authoritative source

5.title: Testing & Validation
5.description: Test across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI, and Bing Copilot. Validate schema and crawlability.
5.visibility: Verify you appear across all major AI platforms

6.title: Monitor & Iterate
6.description: Track AI citations, A/B test answer formats, benchmark competitors, and re-optimize monthly.
6.visibility: Continuous improvement — stay visible as AI engines evolve weekly

features.sectionTitle: Built for AEO from the Ground Up
features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to optimize, test, and monitor your AI search visibility — in one platform.

0.title: 99-Point AEO Checklist
0.description: Phase-by-phase tasks covering every aspect of AEO — from schema markup to content structure to AI crawler access.

5.title: Monitoring & Alerts

0.question: What is Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)?
0.answer: Answer Engine Optimization is the practice of optimizing website content to be cited by AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, and Bing Copilot. Unlike traditional SEO which targets search rankings, AEO focuses on structured data, direct answer formatting, and entity authority to ensure AI systems reference your content.

1.question: How is AEO different from traditional SEO?
1.answer: While SEO optimizes for search engine rankings and click-through rates, AEO optimizes for AI citation and inclusion in generated answers. AEO emphasizes schema markup, concise answer formatting, entity clarity, and E-E-A-T signals that help large language models identify and cite authoritative sources.

2.question: Who is AEO Dashboard built for?
2.answer: AEO Dashboard is built for agencies, SEO professionals, and digital marketers who want to future-proof their clients' online visibility. Whether you manage one website or hundreds, the platform scales with you.

3.question: When will AEO Dashboard launch?
3.answer: We're currently in the final stages of development. Join the waitlist to be notified the moment we launch. We'll also be selecting a small group of early access users to try the platform before the public release.
